name: quick-screenshot
description: Lightning-fast screenshots with clipboard path for Claude

scripts.build: npm run build:background && npm run build:content && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: cp src/manifest.json dist/ && cp -r src/icons dist/ 2>/dev/null || mkdir -p dist/icons
scripts.watch: npm run build && echo 'Watching...' && (npm run build:background -- --watch & npm run build:content -- --watch)
